regen.absent_element: notification for successful or failed access attempts
regen.new_specification: The System shall provide notification for authorized or unauthorized access attempts to the case files.

regen.absent_element: mechanism to handle authorized access attempts that are successful but potentially suspicious
regen.new_specification: The System must be able to capture and store successful access attempts that are flagged as potentially suspicious for further review and analysis.
The System shall notify the administrator when an unauthorized access attempt or validly attempted violation is captured.

label: The System must be able to capture and store violations of cases where violations can validly be attempted.
absence: action of capturing and storing violations of cases where violations can validly be attempted
